title: Row and Column Vectors
description: Interactive visualization comparing row vectors (horizontal, 1×n) and column vectors (vertical, m×1) to help students understand how orientation affects matrix operations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linear Algebra
Matrices
Vectors

learningObjectives: Visually distinguish between row vectors and column vectors
Correctly identify dimensions of row vectors (1×n) and column vectors (m×1)
Understand that vector orientation affects matrix multiplication compatibility
prerequisites: Familiarity with ordered lists of numbers

controls.label: Elements
controls.description: Number of elements in both vectors

controls.label: Randomize
controls.description: Generate new random values for both vectors

controls.label: Show Dimensions
controls.description: Toggle display of dimension annotations (1×n and m×1)

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of row and column vectors
Explore row and column vectors through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of row and column vectors to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on row and column vectors
